name: SWAT 3: Close Quarters Battle
description:
SWAT 3: Close Quarters Battle is an action, shooter and simulation game developed by Sierra Studios. It was originally released in 1999. Sierra On-Line published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play SWAT 3: Close Quarters Battle on PC.
It was produced by Rod Fung. It was directed by Tammy Dargan. Gary Spinrad scored the game.
